channel.title: Bigger chatbox/change gameframe on 317
channel.description:
Greetings. I have an old client I've been messing around with and I was wondering how you changed the gameframe (i dont have very much experience with clients tbh) to something like a 474 (the main thing I'm looking for is the bigger chatbox, it already has correct spirits)
[img]http://i299.photobucket.com/albums/mm320/modscape/ss2014-02-01at033901_zps6cc70ca4.jpg[/img]
Thanks in advance for any help.
